name: Cosmic Ripples
description: Stormy Resolution:Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When hitting a target with Basic Attack, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 3.2%, stacking up to 5 time(s). This effect lasts for 8x and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.5s.

name: Stringmaster
description: Electric Amplification:Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by 12%. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by 12%, stacking up to 2. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional 12%.

name: Lustrous Razor
description: Incision:Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Resonance Skill is released, increases Resonance Liberation DMG by 7%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect lasts for 12s.

name: Verdant Summit
description: Swordsworn:Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by 12%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 24%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.

name: Static Mist
description: Stormy Resolution:Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Outro Skill is released, increases the switched-in Resonator's ATK by 10%, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s.

name: Emerald of Genesis
description: Stormy Resolution:Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by 6%, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.

name: Abyss Surges
description: Stormy Resolution:Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 10%, lasting for 8s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 10%, lasting for 8s.

name: Helios Cleaver
description: Plasma Recoiler:Within 12s after Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by 3% every 2s stacking up to 4 time(s). When the number of stacks reaches 12, all stacks will be reset within 1s.

name: Undying Flame
description: Loyalty:When Intro Skill is released, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 20% for 15s.

name: Thunderbolt
description: Unstoppable:When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 7%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.

name: Cadenza
description: Ceaseless Aria:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

name: Stonard
description: Wallbreaker:When Resonance Skill is released, increases the caster's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 18%, lasting for 15s.

name: Marcato
description: Ceaseless Aria:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

name: Hollow Mirage
description: Celestial Being:When Resonance Liberation is released, grants 3 stack(s) of Iron Armor. Each stack increases ATK and DEF by 3%, stacking up to 3 time(s). When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1.

name: Amity Accord
description: Camaraderie:When Intro Skill is released, increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 20%, lasting for 15s.

name: Novaburst
description: Ever-Changing:When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 4%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s.

name: Discord
description: Ceaseless Aria:When Resonance Skill is released, restore Concerto Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.

name: Dauntless Evernight
description: Battlebound:When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8% and DEF by 15%, lasting for 15s.

name: Autumntrace
description: Edge Direction:Increases ATK by 4% upon dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG, stacking up to 5 time(s). This effect lasts for 7s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.

name: Rectifier#25
description: Dawnbringer:When Resonance Skill is released, if the Resonator's HP is below 60%, restores their HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s; if the Resonator's HP is above 60%.

name: Sword#18
description: Daybreak:When Equipped Resonator's HP drops below 40%, increases Heavy Attack DMG by 18% and restores HP by 5% upon dealing Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s.

name: Broadblade#41
description: Veteran:When the Resonator's HP is above 80%, increases ATK by 12%. When the Resonator's HP is below 40%, restores theri HP by 5% for dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 8s.

name: Gauntlets#21D
description: Mastermind:When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 8%. Increases Counter Attack DMG by 50%, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.

name: Pistols#26
description: Omniscient:When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by 6% every 5s, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1 and restores their HP by 5%.

name: Variation
description: Ceaseless Aria:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

name: Scale: Slasher
description: Ceaseless Aria:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

name: Augment
description: Forgiving Resilience:When Resonance Liberation is released, increases the caster's ATK by 15%, lasting for 15s.

name: Lunar Cutter
description: Preordained:Equipped Resonator gains 6 stack(s) of Oath upon entering the battlefield. Each stack icnreases ATK by 2%, up to 6 stacks. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s. Oath reduces by 1 stack(s) every 2s. Equipped Resonator gains another 6 stack(s) of Oath upon defeating an enemy.

name: Comet Flare
description: Luminous Protection:When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Healing Bonus by 3%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 0.6s.

name: Jinzhou Keeper
description: Guardian:When Intro Skill is released, increases the caster's ATK by 8% and HP by 10%, lasting 15s.

name: Lumingloss
description: Pale Gale:When Resonance Skill is released, increases Basic Attack DMG and Heavy Attack DMG by 20%, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s.

name: Commando of Conviction
description: Unyielding:When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 15%, lasting for 15s.

name: Rectifier of Night
description: Valiance:When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.

description: Long Journey:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

description: Crusade:When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.

description: Temperance:When Resonance Skill is released, restores HP by 3%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 12s.

description: Consensus:Increases Basic Attack and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 12%

description: Rejuvenate:When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, restores HP by 0.5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 3s.

description: Chivalry:When Intro Skill is released, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.

description: Alacrity:When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by 1.6%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
